Description: Head from a monumental statue of King Thutmose I; uraeus head now lost.
Curator's comments: Mysliwiec, Royal Portraiture of the Dynasties XXI-XXX (1988): 47, 58. Published: PM IV, p.52. M. Müller, Zum Bildnistypus Thutmosis I., Göttinger Miszellen 32 (1979), p. 29. I. Lindblad, Royal Sculpture of the Early Eighteenth Dynasty in Egypt (Medelhavsmuseet Memoir 5), Stockholm 1984, 53-4 [B], pl. 32.
